allow: Bash(ssh nagasaku@mie "cd WORK && echo ''1elem_phi20'' | timeout 60 ~/bin/plstss2393_nagasaku > debug_phi20.txt 2>&1 && echo ''=== Analysis completed ==='' || echo ''=== Analysis timed out or failed ===''")

Bash(ssh nagasaku@mie "cd WORK && cp 1elem_f.cml 1elem_phi20psi10.cml && sed -i ''22s/1.74532E-01 8.72664E-02/3.49066E-01 1.74533E-01/'' 1elem_phi20psi10.cml && echo ''Modified to phi=20deg, psi=10deg:'' && sed -n ''22p'' 1elem_phi20psi10.cml")

Bash(ssh nagasaku@mie "cd WORK && echo ''1elem_phi20psi10'' | timeout 60 ~/bin/plstss2393_nagasaku > output/debug_phi20psi10.txt 2>&1 && echo ''=== Analysis completed ==='' || echo ''=== Analysis timed out or failed ===''")
